scenario_text.value: It should be safe here...
Professor, how are your injuries?

I’m feeling better now, thanks to your
treatment.

You’re welcome! But it was Aoi’s idea to
bring the first aid kit!
I just happened to have it...

But where are we?
This isn’t the shrine...
That’s what we’d like to know!

But we have food and water. And Agumon and
the others drove off the enemy, so you’re safe.
Agu...mon...?
Heh heh, that’s me!
U...UWAAAAH!

Hey, it’s okay! Agumon isn’t like the others.
We’re friends!
Yeah, humans have nothing to fear from me!
Or from me.
Yeah, me neither!
Kew, kewww!

I-I see... If you don’t mind, I’d like
a little time to sort out my thoughts...
...Yes, okay. I’ve calmed down now.
...Well, I’ll be a monkey’s uncle.
A monkey’s what-now?

The Kemonogami... They were real all along.
...This is no dream!

Wait, best not jump to conclusions...
I must conduct tests...

I wish this was a dream.
It’s more like a nightmare...

But it’s okay! We’ve got all these guys
on our side.

Hmm... A-After all that I’ve been through...
My head seems clouded in mist...

I feel as if I remembered something...
Or perhaps cannot remember?

My mind is all foggy...
Fog? Was it that gas...?

The fog! Yes, that fog is dangerous! 
Stay away from it, um, “prow fesser”.

Yes, yes I see... It must have some adverse
effect on one’s mental state.

Your unquestioned affiliation with those
creatures may very well be proof...
...Now I know you ain’t talking about me.

Here, drink some water, then we’ll return to
the school. It’s our base of operations.
I see... Thank you, child.
The school... I see, so you must be...
Oh! Oh no...!
What’s wrong, Professor?
If this is no dream...then those children...!

Were they able to escape that beast
unharmed?!

I cannot sit idly by...
I must save Saki and Shuuji!
Unnngh...
Hold on, Professor!
Are you okay?
Stay down!
You mustn’t move!

Save them? That’s crazy talk!
You can barely stand up!

Saki and Shuuji... Do you know where they
are, Professor?

I cannot speak to their current whereabouts,
but I can lead you to where I last saw them.

The professor’s pretty messed up. He can’t
have traveled very far!
Okay, let’s go look for them!
I’m against this...

Yes, yes, we know.
Then stay here and keep a lookout, all right?

Hey, I ain’t gonna let you leave me behind!
Dammit... I’ll go...

Anyway, we’d better hurry!
Please be safe, you two...
